Key Match Events: Dejounte Murray had 14 points, 10 assists and 8 rebounds
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nikola Vucevic tallied 21 points and 11 rebounds
Others: Lonzo Ball played in a regular-season game for the first time since Jan. 14, 2022
McCollum scored five points and Ingram had four during a 9-0 run
Chicago got back within three points
Ingram made 3-pointers to start and complete a 12-2 run
The first quarter featured eight lead changes and three ties
LaVine, who had just three points in the first quarter, scored eight to help Chicago pull even at 45
McCollum's 3-pointer broke the tie before LaVine scored the last eight of his 16 second-quarter points
McCollum's 3-pointer capped a 9-1 run that left the Pelicans with a 59-58 halftime edge
